sizeToFit

protected void sizeToFit()
Determine the largest scale factor that can be used that will allow the current page to be displayed completely. In other words, make the page as large as possible without making it necessary for the user to use scroll bars to view the entire page. This is accomplished by calculating the ratios that represent the actual width of the page relative to the available width, and the actual height of the page to the available height. The smaller of the two values will dictate how large the ratio can be set while still allowing the entire page to be displayed.
